## Download

Choose the appropriate installer for your platform from the assets below:
- **Windows**: `9Boxer-Setup-[VERSION].exe`
- **macOS (Apple Silicon)**: `9Boxer-[VERSION]-macOS-arm64.zip` (M1/M2/M3 Macs)
- **macOS (Intel)**: `9Boxer-[VERSION]-macOS-x64.zip`
- **Linux**: `9Boxer-[VERSION].AppImage`

**First time installing?** See the [Installation Guide](resources/user-guide/docs/installation.md) for detailed instructions.
